title: Immortal, You Have A Very Unlucky Omen!
alternative_title: Tiên Tử; Ngươi Có Điềm Đại Hung!; Xiānzǐ; Nǐ Yǒu Dàxiōng Zhī Zhào!; 仙子，你有大凶之兆！
status: Tiên Tử; Ngươi Có Điềm Đại Hung!; Xiānzǐ; Nǐ Yǒu Dàxiōng Zhī Zhào!; 仙子，你有大凶之兆！
description:
Description :
        Traveling through the world of immortal cultivation, Wa** Xiu discovered that he could see other people's. He could help others resolve bad omens and copy other people's abilities. So whenever someone was in danger, Wa** Xiu would descend from the sky. Thousands of years later, almost all the living geniuses, powerful people, fairies, and demon women owed Wa** Xiu their lives... Dan Fairy: Brother has saved me nine times. I can't repay you for your kindness, so I can only repay you with my body! Jian Fairy: Brother has saved me thirty-two times. It is reasonable for me to give him thirty-two sons, isn't it? White-clothed Empress: He has saved me one hundred and eight times. Are you sure you want to compete with me? Lie Tian Emperor: Big brother has saved me three hundred and twenty-one times. The person who is most qualified to stand by his side is me! ! !
